===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=かまがえる'}}
Appears to be a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=かまがえる'|蟇|tr1=gama|t1=toad|蝦|tr2=kaeru|t2=frog}}.  {{rendaku2|sort=かまがえる'|kaeru|gaeru}}.  The kanji in this term are reversed as {{ja-jukujikun|sort=かまがえる'}} to match the Chinese spelling of the borrowed term ''gama'' (see above).

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|がまがえる|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}
